content: When they rise out of their hiding spot, they'll flood the immediate area with poison, and can do so multiple times, so always be ready to back off when you see noxious fumes billowing up and swap to Thrust Stance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Fungiwoman'.
The content is as follows:
When they rise out of their hiding spot, they'll flood the immediate area with poison, and can do so multiple times, so always be ready to back off when you see noxious fumes billowing up and swap to Thrust Stance.
